sentences.en: Co - ordinate site occupational health & safety program including committee meetings and documentation.
sentences.cn: 确定质量体系文件要求的工作区域的安全和健康,确保两者之间吻合.

sentences.en: Co - ordinate work schedule and supervise team activities to ensure efficient operation.
sentences.cn: 协调工作进度及督促班组工作以确保有效运作.

sentences.en: Colours and looks must fit the themes of the seasons so that the shops co-ordinate well.
sentences.cn: 颜色和外观必须符合季节的主题，这样各个商家看起来才会比较协调。

sentences.en: Do we need to co - ordinate with the ward clerk?
sentences.cn: 我们需要和支会记录员协调 吗 ?

sentences.en: Drag onto the page, then drag one line end to ordinate origin and one to the feature.
sentences.cn: 拖到绘图页上，然后将一个线端拖到坐标原点，一个线端拖到部件。

sentences.en: Functional departments should closely co - ordinate with the front end sales force.
sentences.cn: 职能部门应当与前端销售人员紧密合作.

sentences.en: It &; am # 39 ; s e ential that you co - ordinate the new launch strategy.
sentences.cn: 由你来协调新的上市策略才是重要的.

sentences.en: It helps co - ordinate the different parts of our bodies when we have sports.
sentences.cn: 它帮助公司——纵坐标的不同部分我们的身体当我们有运动。

sentences.en: R is the slope of the straight line and B its ordinate at the origin.
sentences.cn: R是直线的斜率,B是直线在纵坐标上的截距.

sentences.en: She'll show you how to co-ordinate pattern and colours.
sentences.cn: 她会教你如何搭配款式和颜色。

sentences.en: The limit occurs when the ordinate deviates appreciably from unity.
sentences.cn: 这个限度发生在纵坐标明显地从单位1偏离的时候.

sentences.en: The ordinate scale is linear in decibels.
sentences.cn: 纵坐标比例尺以分贝为单位是线性的.

sentences.en: Tie it with fabric bows that co-ordinate with other furnishings.
sentences.cn: 系上与其他装饰相配的布质蝴蝶结。

sentences.en: To direct and co - ordinate the work of QC line supervisor.
sentences.cn: 负责对在线质量控制主管的工作给予指导并做出相应的调整.

sentences.en: Transverse forces acting in the positiveco - ordinate direction are positive.
sentences.cn: 横力作用在正坐标方向的为正.

sentences.en: Upon receipt of properly authorized customer demand, co - ordinate sizing effort.
sentences.cn: 接到适当授权的客户需求后, 协调统筹.

sentences.en: Use a minimum of ordinate and abscissa values so they do not run together.
sentences.cn: 使用最低限度的协调与横坐标值使他们不跑在一起。

sentences.en: We should also learn how to co - ordinate air and ground operations.
sentences.cn: 怎样把天上地下协同起来,我们也要学会.

words.tran_cn: 分类；任命；神职授任；排成等级

trans.tran_en: the vertical or y-coordinate of a point in a two-dimensional system of Cartesian coordinates
